summary: Mike reviewed the current sprint plan for SP-001, praising the foundational focus on US-006 (Basic Authentication) and US-008 (Supabase Backend Integration) while noting their progress since late October and suggesting a potential review for any blocks. He sought input on continuing, adjusting scope, or adding elements like UI wireframes.

actions.task: Review progress on US-006 and US-008 for any blocking issues or lagging execution

risks.risk: Sprint stories US-006 and US-008 have been in progress since late October, potentially indicating delays or blocks
risks.mitigation: Conduct a progress review and consider swapping in lighter tasks if execution is lagging
